summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the reozning of Lots 1-11, Block 1, Marine Highlands Addition and S. 20' of Lot 2 and all of Lots 3-10, Block 1, Bentonia Highlands Addition (Unrecorded) with respect to Use District, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended by adding thereto one new section numbered 2-396.
